modName: Milielle - College of Winterhold Alchemy Instructor
descriptionHtml:
It felt a bit strange that the College of Winterhold lacked any sort of Alchemy trainer, so I decided to try my hand at my own. Milielle is a Master trainer in Alchemy as well as an apothecary merchant. She's located on the second floor of the Hall of Countenance in the College of Winterhold. In case you can't immediately find her, she may be in the next room.


[color=#ff0000][b]Requirements[/b][/color]:
Latest version of Skyrim
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D10168%26preview%3D&pUp=1]ApachiiSkyHair Female Standalone[/url] (Main masterfile not needed. All you need is the "ApachiiSkyHairFemale_v_1_5" under optional files.)


Install: 
Install with NMM or manually place into Steam/Steamapps/common/skyrim/Data.


Unintall:
Uninstall via NMM or delete from Steam/Steamapps/common/skyrim/Data.
author: DigitalVoid
